title: art: Agent Ramírez
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:old-money-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:dia-de-muertos]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
This is an illustration I made of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6038 Agent Guadalupe Ramírez] by [[*user Kilerpoyo]]
[[/div]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=image Agent-Ramirez.jpg width="350em"]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
I'm working on a big character design project with Kilerpoyo! I'm excited to see how I transform their amazing characters into art :) Keep an eye out for more illustrations of characters from their articles/tales!

Please let me know either in the discussion or PM if you'd like to see more character designs or if you have an article that you may want me to design a human or humanoid for. I also make a variety of art, but once I get a good base of humanoid designs, I'll go ahead and begin to consider drawing further out of my comfort zone. Thanks for checking out my art!
[[/div]]
